Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Kamala Harris did not say she believes all of Joe Biden's accusers, particularly Tara Reade, who accused Biden of rape.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that Harris only said she believes women who accused Biden of inappropriate touching, not all offenses.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or specific quotes from Kamala Harris to back up the assertion.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Kamala Harris believes all women who have accused Joe Biden, when in fact she has not expressed belief in all the accusations.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that Kamala Harris may have had different beliefs or statements regarding different accusers of Joe Biden.
